name: Ron Shamir
content: Ron Shamir's personal homepage Prof. Ron Shamir Professor emeritus of Computer Science and Bioinformatics The Blavatnik School of Computer Science, Tel Aviv University Phone: +972-3-640-5383 Fax: +972-3-640-5384 E-Mail: rshamir AT tau DOT ac DOT il Group Homepage • CV • Online available publications • Positions available Publication lists: • pdf • ORCiD • PubMed • DBLP • Google scholar   • The Lens Fields of Interest: Computational Biology / Bioinformatics / Computational Health, Algorithms, Optimization Teaching · Advanced Topics in Computational Genomics (group seminar) Fall and Spring. · I supervise and co-teach with my student Omer Noy Klein the course Machine Learning for Healthcare ·     Full listing including past years Lecture Notes and presentations Computational Genomics Algorithms for Big Data Analysis in Biology and Medicine Analysis of DNA Chips and Gene Networks Advanced Topics in Graph Algorithms Other The Edmond J.
